text:
"Chelsea Lately" is a late night comedy talk show by Chelsea Handler on the E! network. Every episode was presented in a half-hour format, and was broadcast Monday through Friday. The final episode of "Chelsea Lately" aired on August 26, 2014.
Viewers.
From 2012 to 2013, viewership went up from 613,000 to 571,000.
The live hour-long series finale aired August 26 at 11 pm and was viewed by 1.003 million people.
